name: Helsinki University Library
goal:
The goal of Helsinki University Library is
- to offer competent partnership for the good of research and learning
- to offer the research results of the university and the library's expertise to the society's use
- to be an inspiring and prosperous community
- to build its finances on a sustainable base
interests: Education, Information Society, Research and Technology
euInitiatives:
- IPR, copyright reform
- science policy
- open access
